page.title: 09HISTORIC BUILDINGS IN RIPON
page.content:
THE CHAPEL HOSPITAL OF ST.MARY. Inside there is an altar like a table, it is about 5ft long.This would have been used as an operating table in the days when it was an infirmary. The leper chapel or church of St.Mary Magdalen has a small square opening in the wall for distributing communion to the medieval lepers of Ripon.
OBELISK. The obelisk in the market square stands 90ft high and has the city badge on it.The Obelisk is also used as a meeting place for youths.Tourists also wait for the Hornblower at night.
